dkeep.logic

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that keeps information on the level's board(wall layout), its doors' positions, its type and the position of the key/lever
    Author:
    Leonardo Capozzi, Ricardo Carvalho

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(char[][] maparray, int[][] doorsarray, int[] keyposarray, int m)
      Creates a Map given it's key features

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(char[][] maparray,
           int[][] doorsarray,
           int[] keyposarray,
           int m)
        Creates a Map given it's key features
        Parameters:
        maparray - array containing the map's layout
        doorsarray - array containing the doors' coordinates
        keyposarray - array containing the key's coordinates
        m - map's type (1 for dungeon and 2 for keep)

    • Method Detail

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        gets the array with the map as it would be presented in an interface
        Returns:
        char containing the map's layout

      • getMapType

        public int getMapType()
        Gets the level's type
        Returns:
        1 for dungeon and 2 for keep

      • getKeyPos

        public int[] getKeyPos()
        Gets the key's coordinates
        Returns:
        array with key's position

      • getKey

        public int getKey()
        Gets the key status (caught or not)
        Returns:
        0 if the key has been caught and 1 otherwise

      • getDoors

        public int[][] getDoors()
        Gets the doors's positions
        Returns:
        array of array with the coordinates of each door

      • setKey

        public void setKey(int k)
        Sets the key status
        Parameters:
        k - value to set key to(0 if caught or 1 otherwise)

      • to_String

        public java.lang.String to_String()
        Converts the map array into a string for an output interface
        Returns:
        string containing the whole map for output purposes (mainly on the cli option)
